message: Quiero compartir con ustedes mi primer entrada a mi blog: http://starttofail.com/7-things-i-learned-of-game-dev-story
está  un poquito largo :P pero ya lo agregué a mi read it later.
@soska Seguiré escribiendo, tratando de hacerlo más pequeño y que no sea cansado a la vista :).
Ya lo he leído, me ha gustado, interesante... por cierto, conocen http://www.appbackr.com/ alguno lo ha probado?

just read it, is funny and interesting even though it is only a game. Actually there is some similarities in my own real world experience (that after all is much better and more deeper understanding that a game trying to mimic it) oh yeah, when you write i remember it is capital I, it is bad habit of lazy americans to use small i when referring to first person :P But hey, let's do the real world "game" of this? :D
Looks fun, I will read it through as well later on
btw, thanks for the blog post also, it was good to get a few reflections
